title: Halo 3 - Sunrise
heading: Public Beta
body: Welcome to Sunrise, a Halo Server revival project!|n|nWith this first version, you are free to play Matchmaking once again, unlock ranks and achievements, and you can even invite your friends who don't have modded consoles!|n|nFor updates on this project, please visit the Original Halo 3 Discord server at https://discord.gg/KcYgJFXKz8
